content: Claude, this looks great. I know your concept of time isn't the same as mine yet, but that is WAY too long. This needs to take hours, not days. I'm the only human involved, so that should cut things down significantly. You, me and Grok are driving this. Attached are the current files for the first 2 steps. I made the updates to main.py in the last chat and I'm not sure where the env config file is at. What's next?
